Name: Image.LensFlareAnamorphic
Desc: Apply horizontal anamorphic lens flare effect to bright spots in an image.
Example:
const image = Q.Image();
image.LensFlareAnamorphic({ brightnessThreshold: 200 }); // Adds anamorphic lens flare
image.LensFlareAnamorphic({ widthModifier: 1.5, flareColor: [255, 200, 150] }); // Custom colored flare
